channel.title: Agaroth PvP - Entity combat || Gambling || PvM || Global PvP/Drops || Instant PK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://agaroth.com/images/logo.png[/img]
[b][i]Welcome to Agaroth, A Rsps with no limits. Agaroth strives to achieve a smooth and enjoyable gameplay without boundaries. It satisfies everyone from the bossing part of the community to the player killing community. Agaroth brings you back to the enjoyable era of pre-EoC combat and features a great community that we proudly present. There is a great amount of work put into Re-Creating the nostalgic feeling you know and love. It brings us no greater joy to know that you and you're friends are going to go back to the good old days and enjoy what we all remember as a community. With any RsPs, we all know that they're all different, But when you load up your Agaroth Client you know that there is no greater enjoyment, or passion for Scapers of all types, Agarothis a RsPs that brings you closer to the game than ever before, We pride ourselve's with the knowledge that you and you're friends are going to have an epic adventure as it comes down to Bossing, Minigames, Money Making, PvP, Events and so much more. We can't wait until you join us, In this epic adventure you are about to embark on as a community.[/i][/b]
[b][i] [url=http://agaroth.com][img]http://agaroth.com/images/website.png[/img][/url] [url=http://agaroth.com/forums/][img]http://agaroth.com/images/forums.png[/img][/url][url=http://agaroth.com/play.php][img]http://agaroth.com/images/play.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://agaroth.com/images/about.png[/img]
[/i][/b] [b][i]In Agaroth PvP, we focus mainly in PvP and some PvM. Basic items are easy to obtain and levels can be changed with single click.[/i][/b][b][i] Home is compact and PvP drops are generated by game. Shops and main features can be accessed by single tab. [/i][/b]
[b][i]95% of game area is PvP hotspot with very few safe areas. PvP world also supports Duel arena, Fight caves, Fight pits and five bosses[/i][/b] [b][i][color=#33cccc][b][i]you can challane for worthy drops. PvP world also covers some gambling. Players can gamble against eachother with dice duels or flower games. Do you have what it takes to become number one PK-er or even wealthiest PK-er?[/i][/b][/color]
[img]http://agaroth.com/images/features.png[/img] [size=medium][color=#FF8C00][color=#40E0D0]No skilling Full screen client Dicing Flower games Dupe free duel arena Lottery system Summoning combat Advanced PKP formula with antifarming Fighting pits Fighting caves (4 waves) Jewelry/tab teleporting Boss pets Armour sets Quick prayers/curses Wilderness obelisks Rs3 Potions Curses & new prayers (Vigour and sht) All combat summoning npcs with working scrolls and MvM Jailing, Mac ban, timed bans/mutes Perfect barrows sets formulas Combat mode bonuses (Stab +1 accuracy, crush +1 str etc..) Proper d claws special formula Dragonfire shield with accurate special Handcannon with proper special attack Working poison/desease Proper korasi special Proper morrigans specials Proper pvp gear specials Zaryte bow effect Working enchanted jewelry Armor degrading Flawless pathfinder & clipping Pank pins and IP check account security [color=#33cccc][b][i][size=medium][color=#FF8C00][color=#40E0D0]Xlog preventing[/color][/color][/size][/i][/b][/color] Killstreak/Rare drop announcments
Global PvP map Safe spots only bosses, minigames, banks and few custom places Random PvP drop from rarity 85% droptable to 0,05% droptable Tons of gear to fight for, osrs items. Easy access shops and tabs Click skill to set level
Godwars with anticheating Avatar of destruction & Nex Tormented demons Corporeal beast Nomad & Revenants[/color][/color][/size]
And so much more. Hop on and check it out.
[color=#ff3333]Keep in mind that server is untested. There are bugs . Please report your finds on forums. Thanks. This is initial release without planned content. For some period of time, while testing, Server runs on small VPS and there wont be big ads. Wold 2 release is planned in early September![/color] [color=#ff3333]World 3 release is planned in early October. [/color] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/8104e9920caa4b66cdd6e1dcd5a2b902.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/8fa4582f200ec99f0b2923f9604b01ef.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/9f88462771c463e25b8534cd4e59da16.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/4a26482df6117746aeaaee83373d5c8d.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/320f175f750d71bea91b23305b6c9fe2.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/ecf4a7b73c0a1eaea4b977bd9620deed.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/53d110dca2deb94a2f64a6f51e7064d6.png[/img] [img]https://embed.gyazo.com/561f7db4a248661c10ae145fcc77476a.png[/img][/i][/b][/center]

item.title: Agaroth PvP - Entity combat || Gambling || PvM || Global PvP/Drops || Instant PK
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[center]

Welcome to Agaroth, A Rsps with no limits. Agaroth strives to achieve a smooth and enjoyable gameplay without boundaries. It satisfies everyone from the bossing part of the community to the player killing community. Agaroth brings you back to the enjoyable era of pre-EoC combat and features a great community that we proudly present. There is a great amount of work put into Re-Creating the nostalgic feeling you know and love. It brings us no greater joy to know that you and you’re friends are going to go back to the good old days and enjoy what we all remember as a community. With any RsPs, we all know that they’re all different, But when you load up your Agaroth Client you know that there is no greater enjoyment, or passion for Scapers of all types, Agarothis a RsPs that brings you closer to the game than ever before, We pride ourselve’s with the knowledge that you and you’re friends are going to have an epic adventure as it comes down to
Bossing, Minigames, Money Making, PvP, Events and so much more.
We can’t wait until you join us, In this epic adventure you are about to embark on as a community.

[b][i]

[/i][/b]
In Agaroth PvP, we focus mainly in PvP and some PvM. Basic items are easy to obtain and levels can be changed with single click. Home is compact and PvP drops are generated by game. Shops and main features can be accessed by single tab.

95% of game area is PvP hotspot with very few safe areas.
PvP world also supports Duel arena, Fight caves, Fight pits and five bosses
[b][i][color=#33cccc]you can challane for worthy drops. PvP world also covers some gambling. Players can gamble against eachother with dice duels or flower games. Do you have what it takes to become number one PK-er or even wealthiest PK-er?[/color]


[size=medium][color=#FF8C00][color=#40E0D0]No skilling
Full screen client
Dicing
Flower games
Dupe free duel arena
Lottery system
Summoning combat
Advanced PKP formula with antifarming
Fighting pits
Fighting caves (4 waves)
Jewelry/tab teleporting
Boss pets
Armour sets
Quick prayers/curses
Wilderness obelisks
Rs3 Potions
Curses & new prayers (Vigour and sht)
All combat summoning npcs with working scrolls and MvM
Jailing, Mac ban, timed bans/mutes
Perfect barrows sets formulas
Combat mode bonuses (Stab +1 accuracy, crush +1 str etc…)
Proper d claws special formula
Dragonfire shield with accurate special
Handcannon with proper special attack
Working poison/desease
Proper korasi special
Proper morrigans specials
Proper pvp gear specials
Zaryte bow effect
Working enchanted jewelry
Armor degrading
Flawless pathfinder & clipping
Pank pins and IP check account security
[color=#33cccc][size=medium][color=#FF8C00][color=#40E0D0]Xlog preventing[/color][/color][/size][/color]
Killstreak/Rare drop announcments

Global PvP map
Safe spots only bosses, minigames, banks and few custom places
Random PvP drop from rarity 85% droptable to 0,05% droptable
Tons of gear to fight for, osrs items.
Easy access shops and tabs
Click skill to set level

Godwars with anticheating
Avatar of destruction & Nex
Tormented demons
Corporeal beast
Nomad & Revenants[/color][/color][/size]

And so much more. Hop on and check it out.

[color=#ff3333]Keep in mind that server is untested. There are bugs .
Please report your finds on forums. Thanks.
This is initial release without planned content.
For some period of time, while testing,
Server runs on small VPS and there wont be big ads.
Wold 2 release is planned in early September![/color]
[color=#ff3333]World 3 release is planned in early October.
[/color]
